title: Tom brings one-of-a-kind wall hangings to Portland
content:
“We are thrilled to have Thomas join our team,” said Martin Stein, Vice President of Products and Services for Extensis. “Thomas comes to Extensis with a unique tapestry...

[http://www.extensis.com/en/about/press\_release\_content.jsp?releaseId=830...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804034039/http:/www.extensis.com/en/about/press_release_content.jsp?releaseId=8300025 "http://www.extensis.com/en/about/press\_release\_content.jsp?releaseId=8300025")

Congratulations all round!
author: Si_Daniels

comments.content:
Yay for Thomas. _Congratulations._

_(And — Yay for Extensis, for 'getting' him. ;) And, Well, I AM looking forward now to '...the future of font management products...'.)_
